name: Montblanc Norland
text: On Play: If your leader has the <Shandoran Warrior> type and you have a "Kalgara" character in play, add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your life.

effect.text: If your leader has the <Shandoran Warrior> type and you have a "Kalgara" character in play, add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your life.
